ThingDef.label: beret
ThingDef.description: A soft, round, flat-crowned beret part of a military or police uniform.

ThingDef.label: beret SOG
ThingDef.description:
A soft, round, flat-crowned beret part of a military or police uniform. Has an SOG patch on.
Military Assistance Command, Vietnam – Studies and Observations Group (MACV-SOG) was a highly classified, multi-service United States special operations unit which conducted covert unconventional warfare operations prior to and during the Vietnam War.

ThingDef.label: baseball cap tactical
ThingDef.description: A cap that includes a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes. Has velcro for patches.

ThingDef.label: baseball cap backwards
ThingDef.description: A cap that includes a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes. Worn backwards.

ThingDef.label: baseball cap Ace
ThingDef.description: A cap that includes a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes. Has an ace of spades logo.

ThingDef.label: baseball cap Legend
ThingDef.description: A cap that includes a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes. Has a SEAL team 3 Platoon Charlie logo.

ThingDef.label: baseball cap Punisher
ThingDef.description: A cap that includes a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes. Has the Punisher logo.

ThingDef.label: baseball cap MRGA
ThingDef.description: A cap that includes a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes. This hat has words that says "Make Rimworld Great Again". It encourages the wearer to make some solid negotiations.

ThingDef.label: baseball cap M81
ThingDef.description: A cap that includes a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes. Has M81 camo.

ThingDef.label: baseball cap Multicam
ThingDef.description: A cap that includes a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes. Has Multicam.

ThingDef.label: baseball cap PMC
ThingDef.description: A cap that includes a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes. Has military grade headphones for comms.

ThingDef.label: baseball cap Nomad
ThingDef.description: A cap that includes a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes. Has a Spartan logo and military headphone for comms, worn by a Ghost Recon member.

ThingDef.label: boonie hat
ThingDef.description: A boonie hat, also known as giggle hat, is a form of wide-brim hat commonly used by military forces. Its design is similar to a bucket hat but with a stiffer brim.

ThingDef.label: boonie hat M81
ThingDef.description: A boonie hat, also known as giggle hat, is a form of wide-brim hat commonly used by military forces. Its design is similar to a bucket hat but with a stiffer brim. Has M81 camo.

ThingDef.label: boonie hat Multicam
ThingDef.description: A boonie hat, also known as giggle hat, is a form of wide-brim hat commonly used by military forces. Its design is similar to a bucket hat but with a stiffer brim. Has Multicam.

ThingDef.label: bandana red
ThingDef.description: An artistically terrifying bandana. Hides the wearer's face and makes them more confident.

ThingDef.label: bandana tan
ThingDef.description: An artistically terrifying bandana. Hides the wearer's face and makes them more confident.

ThingDef.label: balaclava
ThingDef.description: An artistically terrifying balaclava. Hides the wearer's face and makes them more confident.

ThingDef.label: balaclava Skully
ThingDef.description: An artistically terrifying skull balaclava. Hides the wearer's face and makes them more confident.

ThingDef.label: balaclava Ghost Riley
ThingDef.description: An artistically terrifying ghost balaclava. Hides the wearer's face and makes them more confident

ThingDef.label: balaclava Keegan
ThingDef.description: An artistically terrifying ghost balaclava. Hides the wearer's face and makes them more confident.

ThingDef.label: ghillie suit hood
ThingDef.description:
A ghillie suit is a type of camouflage clothing designed to resemble the background environment such as foliage, snow or sand.
This hood is a part of the ghillie suit.

ThingDef.label: Shemagh
ThingDef.description:
The keffiyeh or kufiya also known as shemagh is a traditional Middle Eastern headdress fashioned from a square scarf, usually made of cotton.
It is commonly found in arid regions as it provides protection from sunburn, dust and sand.

ThingDef.label: Shemagh white
ThingDef.description:
The keffiyeh or kufiya also known as shemagh is a traditional Middle Eastern headdress fashioned from a square scarf, usually made of cotton.
It is commonly found in arid regions as it provides protection from sunburn, dust and sand.

ThingDef.label: Shemagh olive
ThingDef.description:
The keffiyeh or kufiya also known as shemagh is a traditional Middle Eastern headdress fashioned from a square scarf, usually made of cotton.
It is commonly found in arid regions as it provides protection from sunburn, dust and sand.

ThingDef.label: Shemagh green
ThingDef.description:
The keffiyeh or kufiya also known as shemagh is a traditional Middle Eastern headdress fashioned from a square scarf, usually made of cotton.
It is commonly found in arid regions as it provides protection from sunburn, dust and sand.

ThingDef.label: beanie
ThingDef.description: A soft, thick cap. Great for keeping warm in winter.

ThingDef.label: beanie Division
ThingDef.description: A beanie for warm weather and a respirator type device designed to protect the wearer from inhaling particulate matter, including airborne microorganisms, fumes, vapours and gases. Worn by agents from The Division.

ThingDef.label: tuque M81
ThingDef.description: A soft, thick cap. Great for keeping warm in winter.

ThingDef.label: tuque Multicam
ThingDef.description: A soft, thick cap. Great for keeping warm in winter.

ThingDef.label: gasmask GP-5
ThingDef.description:
The GP-5 gas mask is a Soviet-made single-filter gas mask. It was issued to the Soviet population starting in 1962; production ended in 1990.
It can operate in all weather and withstand temperatures from −40 degrees (Celsius and Fahrenheit) to 114 °C (237 °F).

ThingDef.label: gasmask 4A1
ThingDef.description: The Israeli 4A1 is a civilian mask, made shortly after the Model 4. The 4A1 built on the Model 4 by replacing the main exhale valve with a grid, and adding a drinking tube.

ThingDef.label: halfmask
ThingDef.description: The halfmask is a respirator type device designed to protect the wearer from inhaling particulate matter, including airborne microorganisms, fumes, vapours and gases.

ThingDef.label: field cap DCU
ThingDef.description: A patrol cap, also known as a field cap, is a soft kepi with a stiff, rounded visor, and flat top, somewhat similar to a baseball cap, worn by the military personnel of some countries in the field when a combat helmet is not required. Has DCU camo.

ThingDef.label: field cap M81
ThingDef.description: A patrol cap, also known as a field cap, is a soft kepi with a stiff, rounded visor, and flat top, somewhat similar to a baseball cap, worn by the military personnel of some countries in the field when a combat helmet is not required. Has M81 camo.

ThingDef.label: field cap Multicam
ThingDef.description: A patrol cap, also known as a field cap, is a soft kepi with a stiff, rounded visor, and flat top, somewhat similar to a baseball cap, worn by the military personnel of some countries in the field when a combat helmet is not required. Has Multicam.
